Literature.Title: De novo generation of short antimicrobial peptides with enhanced stability and cell specificity.
Literature.Author: Kim H, Jang JH, Kim SC, Cho JH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3038(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>64µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15752(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 27325(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 2370(MIC=>64µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>64µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 34881(MIC=>64µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 44774(MIC=>64µg/ml)
